You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesA A] > &acy;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Acy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0410/index.htm U+00410].
  * `&acy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0430/index.htm U+00430].
